# TOPSIS Python Package

This package implements the **TOPSIS (Technique for Order Preference by Similarity to Ideal Solution)** method.

## Installation

pip install Topsis-Aarushi-102303601

## Usage

topsis-aarushi data.xlsx "1,1,1,2,2" "+,+,-,-,-" result.xlsx

## Input File

- First column: alternatives
- Remaining columns: numeric criteria values

## Output

- Excel file containing:
  - Topsis Score
  - Rank
